law.catch_line: The provisions of this subtitle, except the provisions of §§ 3-403(a), 3-406, and 3-411 of this su...
law.text: The provisions of this subtitle, except the provisions of §§ 3-403(a), 3-406, and 3-411 of this subtitle, are severable. The finding by a court that a severable provision of this subtitle is invalid does not affect the validity or operation of the other provisions of this subtitle, unless the court finds that the lone remaining valid provisions are incomplete and incapable of being executed in accordance with the legislative intent.
